name: Parthenon Software Group
description:
We build high performing web apps, mobile apps, and custom software for our clients.  We differentiate ourselves with world-class client service and deep technical expertise with our ability to solve complex technical challenges.
Parthenon Software Group is a hand picked group of the best developers in the Pacific Northwest.  Our goal is to transform your work flow into a smooth and profitable process through the power of efficient programming. We understand business and we strive to understand your business as if it were our own.
Each one of our developers is hand-picked based on their skills and ability to work as a team. We're big enough to help, and agile enough to respond to the changing needs of our clients. Parthenon works with your business, no matter its size, to be faster and more effective on the web and internally.
